work.summary: Manager for 3 agile, collaborative, and highly capable teams.
highlights: Spearheaded the transition from horizontal functional teams to cross functional Scrum teams.
Provided coaching and mentorship with bi-weekly 1:1 meetings with each developer.
Acted as a Release Manager for our weekly releases.

work.summary: Worked on a team of talented developers to deliver new features for our Payroll & HR software.
highlights: Implemented an integration for a two way sync of data with Intacct utilizing their API.
Implemented a feature to display the annual projected salary for employees.

work.company: CentralSquare Technologies (merged from Aptean Public Sector & Healthcare)
work.summary: Responsible for overall architecture of the regulatory software Jurisdiction Online, and provide technical guidance for team members.
highlights: Migrated our SaaS application from on-premise, bare-metal servers to AWS with minimal downtime
Improved the stability of our SaaS application by reducing the number of threads in use by over 80%
Spearheaded effort to deprecate TLS 1.0 from our web applications

work.company: Praeses (acquired by Aptean Public Sector & Healthcare)
work.summary: Served as technical lead for a distributed agile team as well as an internal technical community that spread adoption of REST architecture through mentorship. Interviewed potential candidates and on-boarded new developers.
highlights: Reduced VB6 coupling by introducing a custom COM+ application to call our REST API
Provided technical guidance and architecture for a rewrite of a business critical module that is accessed over 10 thousand times a day by clients
Spearheaded team effort to modernize over 50 pages of our product to support all modern browsers

work.company: Praeses (acquired by Aptean Public Sector & Healthcare)
work.summary: Synergized talents with other customer success team members to rectify customer discrepancies and defect resolution.
highlights: Implemented a REST API to enable customization of dynamic form creation and submission
Leveraged mediator pattern to simplify implementation of cross-cutting concerns which created a notable reduction in boilerplate code needed in new features

work.company: Bowman Systems (now part of Mediware Information Systems, Inc)
work.summary: Member of a team that preserved an ETL process for reporting PostgreSQL database that transferred ~3TB of data from multiple production databases each night

work.company: Bowman Systems (now part of Mediware Information Systems, Inc)
work.summary: Member of the Customer Support Dev team that worked on solving customer issues.
